item.title: “Bhai kya badla le liya teri team ne”: Virender Sehwag terms Zimbabwe win vs Pakistan as great revenge for fake Mr Bean
item.description: “Bhai kya badla le liya teri team ne”: Virender Sehwag terms Zimbabwe win vs Pakistan as great revenge for fake Mr Bean Virender Sehwag terms Zimbabwe win: The former Indian batter further added meat to the Mr.

item.title: Is Pakistan out of T20 World Cup: Can Pakistan qualify for ICC T20 World Cup 2022 semi final?
item.description: Is Pakistan out of T20 World Cup: Can Pakistan qualify for ICC T20 World Cup 2022 semi final?

item.title: India vs Netherlands T20 head to head records: IND vs NED head to head in T20 history
item.description: India vs Netherlands T20 head to head records: IND vs NED head to head in T20 history India vs Netherlands T20 head to head: The SportsRush presents for you the Head to Head statistics for IND vs NED T20 World Cup match.

item.title: “No excuses at all”: Michael Vaughan criticizes England for not being good enough vs Ireland at the MCG
item.description: “No excuses at all”: Michael Vaughan criticizes England for not being good enough vs Ireland at the MCG Former English captain Michael Vaughan has criticized England for their performance against Ireland in ICC T20 World Cup 2022.

item.title: “Hardik wants to play all the games”: Paras Mhambrey confirms India won’t rest Hardik Pandya or other key players for Super 12 match vs Netherlands
item.description: “Hardik wants to play all the games”: Paras Mhambrey confirms India won’t rest Hardik Pandya or other key players for Super 12 match vs Netherlands India’s bowling coach Paras Mhambrey has said that Hardik Pandya wants to play all the game and he won’t be rested against the Netherlands.

item.title: “Wow, Marcus Stoinis you beauty”: Shoaib Akhtar compliments Marcus Stoinis for scoring fastest 50 in T20 international among Australian batters
item.description: “Wow, Marcus Stoinis you beauty”: Shoaib Akhtar compliments Marcus Stoinis for scoring fastest 50 in T20 international among Australian batters Shoaib Akhtar compliments Marcus Stoinis: The former Pakistani speedster expressed approval of the Australian all-rounder.

item.title: “We must have a Bonus Point”: Aakash Chopra propounds rule change in T20 World Cup points system
item.description: “We must have a Bonus Point”: Aakash Chopra propounds rule change in T20 World Cup points system Aakash Chopra propounds rule change: The former Indian batter proposed a new rule with respect to points system.

item.title: SA vs ZIM pitch report Blundstone Arena: Hobart pitch report for South Africa vs Zimbabwe T20 World Cup match
item.description: SA vs ZIM pitch report Blundstone Arena: Hobart pitch report for South Africa vs Zimbabwe T20 World Cup match SA vs ZIM pitch report Blundstone Arena: The venue will host the sixth ‘Super 12’ stage match of the ongoing T20 World Cup 2022.
